response.original_title: With Love, Black Women Can Fly
response.overview: With Love, Black Women Can Fly is an experimental documentary video collaboration between Black women who are activists, mental healthcare professionals, artists, lovers, mothers and more. The film explores the stigmatization of mental health issues in the Black community, the lived experiences of Black women seeking proper healthcare, and the role of community, love and support in the journeys of Black women who are healing, recovering or struggling with maintaining emotional and mental wellness.
response.title: With Love, Black Women Can Fly
